## Dataset

For this assignment, we are going to use AirPassengers data that comes with R datasets package.

AirPassengers dataset contains data of Monthly Airlines passengers from 1949 to 1960

## Shiny Application

In this application, a plot will be displayed of Monthly Airline passenger data.

User has to select maximum year in the left slider and plot will display airline passenger data starting from 1949 till the selected year
